original_title: Two wanted underworld criminals arrested in Dubai and brought to Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Two underworld figures wanted over their alleged involvement in multiple murders and illegal activities, have been arrested by the CID in Dubai and brought to Sri Lanka.
The suspects, K. Dimuthu Chaturanga (26) and Dinesh Sharman (48), were escorted back to Sri Lanka early this morning, according to Public Security Minister Tiran Alles.
